main event: Two bright light sources, appearing like airplanes or helicopters, were observed moving at high speed almost silently from southeast to northwest.
interesting points: The objects were described as bright white with a slight blue tinge,The sighting lasted about 2 minutes with no visible strobed lights or sound,Several persons witnessed the event,There was uncertainty about whether the objects were airplanes or helicopters,The objects seemed to glide and had no definite shape due to their bright light.
witness description: civilian employees and observers in the area
